INDEL ANALYSIS to estimate number of distinct variants scored by pooling true_indels from all exons
and to see how indel frame matters across exons / ID specific variants that do / don't cause depletion

```{r}
#Load packages needed
require(gridExtra)
require(mclust)
library(mixtools)
require(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
require(VennDiagram)
library(gam)
library(plotROC)
require(tidyverse)

#LOAD ENVIRONMENT
date <- "250711"

options(digits = 15)

BRCA1_editing_info <- read.table("~/OneDrive - The Francis Crick Institute/R/220915_BRCA1x1u1u2x10a/BRCA1_editing_data.txt",header=TRUE, sep="\t")
#must rename this for each experiment.
experiment_dir_220926 = "~/OneDrive - The Francis Crick Institute/R/220915_BRCA1x1u1u2x10a/BRCA1u1_final/"

#cut positions -- fix later
BRCA1x1_cut_pos = 41277356
BRCA1u1_cut_pos = 41277451 

BRCA1u1rL41.indel_file <- paste(experiment_dir_220926,'BRCA1u1rL42','_annotated_sindels.txt',sep='')
BRCA1u1rL42.indel_file <- paste(experiment_dir_220926,'BRCA1u1rL41','_annotated_sindels.txt',sep='')
BRCA1u1rL41.indels <- read.table(BRCA1u1rL41.indel_file, header=TRUE, sep="\t")
BRCA1u1rL42.indels <- read.table(BRCA1u1rL42.indel_file, header=TRUE, sep="\t")

View(BRCA1u1rL41.indels)
View(BRCA1u1rL42.indels)

BRCA1u1rL41.indels$exon <- 'BRCA1u1'
BRCA1u1rL41.indels$frame <- 'NA'
BRCA1u1rL41.indels[which(BRCA1u1rL41.indels$indel_frame == 0),]$frame = rep('in',length(which(BRCA1u1rL41.indels$indel_frame == 0)))
BRCA1u1rL41.indels[which(BRCA1u1rL41.indels$indel_frame != 0),]$frame = rep('out',length(which(BRCA1u1rL41.indels$indel_frame != 0)))

#note -- this is normalized to experiment median of SNVs (not syn. snvs)
BRCA1u1rL41.indels$post_pre_ratio_synnorm <- BRCA1u1rL41.indels$post_pre_ratio/BRCA1u1rL41_tSNV_post_pre_med
BRCA1u1rL41.indels$post_lib_ratio_synnorm <- BRCA1u1rL41.indels$post_lib_ratio/BRCA1u1rL41_tSNV_post_lib_med
BRCA1u1rL41.indels$pre_lib_ratio_synnorm <- BRCA1u1rL41.indels$pre_lib_ratio/BRCA1u1rL41_tSNV_pre_lib_med

BRCA1u1rL42.indels$post_pre_ratio_synnorm <- BRCA1u1rL42.indels$post_pre_ratio/BRCA1u1rL42_tSNV_post_pre_med
BRCA1u1rL42.indels$post_lib_ratio_synnorm <- BRCA1u1rL42.indels$post_lib_ratio/BRCA1u1rL41_tSNV_post_lib_med
BRCA1u1rL42.indels$pre_lib_ratio_synnorm <- BRCA1u1rL42.indels$pre_lib_ratio/BRCA1u1rL41_tSNV_pre_lib_med

#renaming columns in replicate 2

BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels <- BRCA1u1rL41.indels[which(BRCA1u1rL41.indels$variant %in% BRCA1u1rL42.indels$variant),]
BRCA1u1rL42rL41.indels <- BRCA1u1rL42.indels[which(BRCA1u1rL42.indels$variant %in% BRCA1u1rL41.indels$variant),c('variant', 'pre', 'post','post_pre_ratio','post_pre_ratio_synnorm','post_lib_ratio','post_lib_ratio_synnorm', 'pre_lib_ratio', 'pre_lib_ratio_synnorm')]
colnames(BRCA1u1rL42rL41.indels) <- c('variant','rL42_pre', 'rL42_post', 'rL42_post_pre_ratio','rL42_post_pre_ratio_synnorm','rL42_post_lib_ratio','rL42_post_lib_ratio_synnorm', 'rL42_pre_lib_ratio', 'rL42_pre_lib_ratio_synnorm')

#rL42 pre-lib needs to be included - done
#calculate mean of pre-lib across reps - done
#update the loess model below to train only on indels
#subtract the fit from each indel score 

#Fix post_lib_ratio averaging here and map below

BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels <- merge(BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels,BRCA1u1rL42rL41.indels,by='variant')
BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_pre_ratio_rL41rL42 <- (BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_pre_ratio+BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$rL42_post_pre_ratio)/2
BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_pre_ratio_synnorm_rL41rL42 <- (BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_pre_ratio_synnorm+BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$rL42_post_pre_ratio_synnorm)/2 
BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_pre_ratio_rL41rL42 <- (BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_lib_ratio+BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$rL42_post_lib_ratio)/2
BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_lib_ratio_synnorm_rL41rL42 <- (BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$post_lib_ratio_synnorm+BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$rL42_post_lib_ratio_synnorm)/2 
BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels.true <- BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels[which(BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$true_indel == 'True' | BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$true_indel == 'WT'),]
BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels.sge <- BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels[which(BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$sge_indel == 'True' | BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels$true_indel == 'WT'),]

####creating df of 1bp / 5bp dels####
BRCA1u1_indels_export <- BRCA1u1rL41rL42.indels %>% 
  select(variant, cigar, ext_cigar, edit_string, pre, post, neg, rL42_pre, rL42_post, lib,  lib_freq, pre_freq, true_indel, sge_indel, indel_type, indel_size, indel_start_pos, indel_frame, post_pre_ratio_synnorm, rL42_post_pre_ratio_synnorm, post_pre_ratio_synnorm_rL41rL42) %>% 
  filter(indel_size == 5 | indel_size == 1) %>% 
  filter(indel_type == "D") %>% 
  filter(lib_freq > 0.0001) %>% 
  filter(sge_indel == "True") %>% 
  mutate(pos_first_deleted = 41277520 - indel_start_pos,
         post_last_deleted = 41277520 - indel_start_pos - indel_size + 1,
         cHGVS_start = indel_start_pos -252,
         cHGVS_end = indel_start_pos - 252 - 1 + indel_size) %>% 
  mutate(cHGVS = case_when(indel_size == 1 ~ paste0("c.", cHGVS_start, "del"),
                           indel_size == 5 ~ paste0("c.", cHGVS_start, "_", cHGVS_end, "del")),
         pos_mid_point = case_when(indel_size == 1 ~ pos_first_deleted,
                           indel_size == 5 ~ pos_first_deleted - 2)) %>% 
   mutate(r1_function_score = log2(post_pre_ratio_synnorm),
          r2_function_score = log2(rL42_post_pre_ratio_synnorm),
          function_score = (r1_function_score + r2_function_score)/2)

#
write.csv(file = paste0("~/Downloads/Run_SGE_scripts/", date, "_BRCA1u1_indels.csv"), x = BRCA1u1_indels_export, row.names = FALSE)
```
